description: Try our easy to follow Caprese Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Caprese Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Optional - Drizzle basil pesto over the salad before serving to take the flavour to the next level.
